name: This reservation is non-refundable.
description: Once a reservation is made, it cannot be refunded under any circumstances.

name: Guests must check in before 10 PM.
description: Check-in is only allowed before 10 PM for security and operational reasons.

name: Late check-out requires prior approval.
description: Late check-out is subject to availability and must be approved in advance.

name: Pets are not allowed on the premises.
description: For health and safety reasons, pets are not allowed on site.

name: Smoking is prohibited inside the building.
description: Smoking indoors is prohibited to maintain a clean and safe environment.

name: Quiet hours are from 10 PM to 8 AM.
description: To ensure a peaceful environment, guests must keep noise levels low during these hours.

name: Valid ID is required at check-in.
description: Guests must present a valid ID for verification at the time of check-in.

name: Alcohol consumption is only allowed in designated areas.
description: Alcohol is only permitted in specific areas for guest safety and compliance with local regulations.

name: Guests must wear proper attire in public areas.
description: For the comfort and respect of all guests, appropriate attire must be worn in shared spaces.

name: Children must be supervised at all times.
description: For the safety of children, they must be supervised by an adult in all areas.

name: Additional guests beyond the reservation are not allowed.
description: To ensure safety and comfort, only the number of guests specified in the reservation are permitted.

name: Parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis.
description: Parking spots are limited and cannot be guaranteed. Availability is on a first-come, first-served basis.

name: Cancellation must be made 48 hours in advance.
description: To avoid penalties, cancellations must be done at least 48 hours before the scheduled arrival.

name: Noise complaints may result in eviction.
description: Excessive noise may lead to immediate eviction from the premises to ensure a peaceful environment.

name: A security deposit is required at check-in.
description: A refundable security deposit is collected at check-in to cover potential damages or violations of rules.

name: Guests must adhere to local COVID-19 guidelines.
description: All guests are required to follow local COVID-19 health and safety regulations.

name: Cooking is allowed only in designated kitchen areas.
description: Cooking is strictly prohibited in non-designated areas to prevent fire hazards and maintain cleanliness.

name: Guests must notify management of any damage or issues.
description: Any damages or issues must be reported to management immediately for prompt resolution.

name: The pool is open from 8 AM to 10 PM.
description: For safety reasons, the pool is available for use only during these hours.

name: No outside food or beverages allowed in the restaurant.
description: To comply with health regulations, outside food and beverages are not permitted in the restaurant.

name: All guests must sign a waiver for activities.
description: Guests participating in activities must sign a waiver to acknowledge risk and safety guidelines.

name: Rooms must be vacated by 11 AM on the check-out date.
description: To accommodate incoming guests, rooms must be vacated by 11 AM on the day of check-out.

name: The gym is open from 6 AM to 9 PM.
description: For guest convenience, the gym is open during these hours only.

name: No illegal substances allowed on the premises.
description: The use of illegal substances is strictly prohibited and may result in immediate eviction.

name: Guests must respect the privacy of others.
description: To ensure comfort and respect for all guests, privacy must be maintained at all times.

name: Unregistered visitors are not allowed in guest rooms.
description: To ensure safety and privacy, only registered guests are permitted in the rooms.

name: In case of emergency, guests must follow staff instructions.
description: During emergencies, guests must follow the instructions of staff to ensure safety.

name: Laundry services are available between 9 AM and 7 PM.
description: Laundry services are only available during these hours.

name: Minors must be accompanied by a guardian to enter the pool.
description: For safety, minors must be supervised by a guardian when using the pool.

name: Guests are responsible for their own valuables.
description: Management is not responsible for any lost or stolen items. Guests should secure their valuables.

name: Rooms are cleaned only upon request.
description: For environmental reasons, rooms are cleaned upon guest request only.

name: Weapons are not permitted on the premises.
description: To ensure safety, weapons of any kind are prohibited on the premises.

name: Guests must dispose of trash in designated bins.
description: To maintain cleanliness, all trash must be disposed of in the appropriate bins.
